show_name: Kodomo no Jikan: Anata ga Watashi ni Kureta Mono (OAV)
other_title: Child's time : That which you gave to me
こどものじかん やすみじかん「〜あなたがわたしにくれたもの〜」 (Japanese)
こどものじかん「あなたがわたしにくれたもの」 (Japanese)
plot: After a day of shopping at the mall for a birthday gift for their teacher Aoki-sensei, Rin and her two friends Kuro and Mimi decide to stay overnight at Rin's home to make gifts for Aoki instead.
opening_theme: "Otome Chikku Shoshinsha desu" by Kitamura Eri & Shindou Kei & Kadowaki
